extension.summary: Globo Play, Globosat Play and Premium Channels on Kodi
extension.description: Brazilian video streaming services for subscribers
extension.news: 0.0.22 - Support for 4k HDR content - Support for local programming - Support for Futura Live Channel - Suport for BBB (Globosat and GloboPlay) - Suport for Universal Channel Live - Support for Globosat Play Geolocation - Updated Combate scraper logic - Added more Combate content - Globosat Play and Sexyhot Play now use Globo Play credentials (must be associated to the provider in the website) - Support for REDE AMAZONICA Globo affiliate - update Globoplay epg API - option to set different credentials for Globosat play - option to disable Globosat play

6.2.0 [add] Context menu -> 'Play with subtitles' |contrib: solarus| [add] Option to download subtitles before playback in Settings -> General -> Configure subtitles [add] Refresh context menu to all videos/live streams [add] &strm=true parameter for strm files in Kodi 18 |contrib: vlmaksime| - use description from library and set watched status [add] 'Settings -> Advanced -> Use YouTube website urls' for external/alternative players eg. Player: MPC-BE, URL: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C0NyvxTJGcQ [fix] Reported background progress dialog percentage [fix] Playlist items, use video_items instead of playback_items [fix] search history size [fix] remove Spanish (Latin America)|es-419 from the setup wizard, causing invalidLanguage and invalidRelevanceLanguage errors [upd] Improve speed of playback starting and resolver before: min: 1.5s max: 2.6s median: 1.7s after: min: 0.9s max: 2.6s median: 1.2s [chg] refactor logging and system version [chg] Localize confirmation [lang] el_gr strings |contrib: twilight0| [lang] es_es strings |contrib: roliverosc| [lang] es_mx strings |contrib: Intel11| [lang] it_it strings |contrib: SebastianoPistore| [lang] nl_nl strings |contrib: Markman-B| [lang] ru_ru strings |contrib: vlmaksime|
extension.description: YouTube is one of the biggest video-sharing websites of the world.
extension.disclaimer: This plugin is not endorsed by Google
extension.description: YouTube הוא אחד מאתרי שיתוף הווידאו הגדולים בעולם.
YouTube ist eines der größten Video-Sharing-Websites der Welt.
YouTube jest jednym z największych na świecie serwisów udostępniania wideo.
A YouTube világ egyik legnagyobb videómegosztó weboldala.
YouTube es uno de los sitios web para compartir videos más grande del mundo.
extension.disclaimer: Este add-on no está respaldado por Google
extension.description: YouTube es uno de los más grandes sitios web de intercambio de videos del mundo.
extension.disclaimer: Este add-on no está respaldado por Google
extension.description: YouTube - популярнейший видеохостинговый сайт, предоставляющий пользователям услуги хранения, доставки и показа видео.
YouTube est l'un des plus grands sites de partage vidéos du monde.
「Youtube」是全世界最大的影片分享網站
「Youtube」是全世界最大的影片分享網站
YouTube е един от най-големите уеб сайтове за споделяне на видео в целия свят.
Το YouTube είναι μία από τις μεγαλύτερες ιστοσελίδες διαμοιρασμού βίντεο στον κόσμο.
extension.disclaimer: Η παρούσα μικροεφαρμογή δεν έχει υϊοθετηθεί από την Google
extension.description: YouTube er en av verdens største nettsider for videodeling.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.description: Assista aos videos das músicas das playlists do Spotify via Youtube
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.summary: Teste - Forked from livestreamsPro by Shani, with small adjusts in regex
extension.description: 2.8.7 -> Changed time xbmc.sleep() In addition to what livestreams allowed you to do, you can now, 1. call regex in regex, 2. multiple regex in page, regex in session, also htmlunescape responses 3. create session from one regex and pass onto next in line 4. save sessions to a file and open again later 5. write python code in .py file, put in the profile directory and then call from your regex. 6. use epoctime, guid and unpack as functions already defined. 7. Use it to post values to the pages to get the proper responses 8. support many headers, like origin, X-Requested-With 9. you can now append cookies in response and then read in regex using includeheaders 10. You can now link to another web url via your xml using externallink 11. support for google captcha, now you can show and then post the text

extension.summary: Resolve common live video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi + find links embeded in sites.

extension.description: Use this addon to play F4m v1 and v2 streams
Musik aus verschiedenen Quellen z.B. Billboard, iTunes, Spotify etc. auswählen und über Youtube abspielen.[CR][CR]Für mehr Informationen zu allen Neuerungen siehe - CHANGELOG.[CR] TEST IT AND LIKE IT
Choose Music from different sources e.g. Billboard, iTunes, Spotify etc. and play it via Youtube.[CR][CR]For more information about all new features see - CHANGELOG.[CR] TEST IT AND LIKE IT
extension.disclaimer: Die von diesem Addon dargestellten Inhalte werden von den Erstellern des Addons weder gehostet oder verbreitet, noch stehen die Ersteller in irgendeiner Beziehung zu den Anbietern des Inhalts.
The author does not host or distribute any of the content displayed by this addon. The author does not have any affiliation with the content providers.
